item.title: Hedonic Reversal 22.05.20
item.contentencoded: Estos días la repetición puede llegar a cansar mucho y a llevarnos a estados de ánimo muy dispares y opuestos. Este mix intenta reflejar esos estados de ánimo a través de música que he descubierto, rescatado o simplemente escuchado mucho estas ultimas semanas en cuarentena.

item.title: Hedonic Reversal 22.05.20
item.contentencoded:
30 trallazos en 60 minutos de HC/Punk que poco tienen que ver con la música habitual de Hedonic Reversal pero que han sido una constante en mi tocadiscos durante las últimas semanas. Disfrútenlo.

  • Bad Religion - We’re Only Gonna Die - How Could Hell Be Any Worse (Epitaph, 1982)

  • Negative Approach - Said And Done -  Tied Down (Touch & Go, 1983)

  • Citizens Arrest - In The Distance - A Light In The Darkness (Wardance, 1990)

  • Bl’ast - The Future - The Power Of Expression (SST Records, 1987)

  • Gang Green - Alcohol - Another Wasted Night (Taang! Records, 1986)

  • Cerebros Exprimidos - No Sabes Que Existo (Munster Records, 1996)

  • Minor Threat - In My Eyes - In My Eyes (Dischord Records, 1981)

  • DFL - Return Of The Knucklehead - Proud To Be (Epitaph, 1995)

  • Corrosion Of Conformity - Consumed - Animosity (Death Records, 1985)

  • Dwarves - Let’s Fuck - Blood Guts And Pussy (Sub Pop, 1990)

  • Beastie Boys - Tough Guy - Ill Communication (Capitol Records, 1994)

  • Circle Jerks - Leave Me Alone - Wild In The Streets (Faulty Products, 1982)

  • Misfits - Bullet - Bullet 7” (Plan 9, 1979)

  • Negative FX - Feel Like A Man - Negative FX (Taang! Records, 1985)

  • Teen Idles - Sneakers - Minor Disturbance E.P. (Dischord Records, 1980)

 

  • Germs - American Leather - (GI) (Slash, 1979)

  • RKL - Scab On My Brain -  Rock & Roll Nightmare (Alchemy Records, 1987)

  • GBH - Self Destruct - No Survivors (Clay Records, 1982)

  • Discharge - Decontrol - Decontrol 7” (Clay Records, 1980)

  • Zeke - Overkill - Flat Tracker ( Scooch Pooch, 1996)

  • Ill Repute - Oxnard - What Happens Next (Mystic Records, 1984)

  • Wasted Youth - We Were On Heroin - Reagan’s In (Medusa Records, 1990)

  • The Freeze - Warped Confessional - Rabid Reaction (Modern Method Records, 1985)

  • Adrenaline OD - Office Building - Humungousfungusamongus (Buy Our Records, 1986)

  • Raw Power - State Oppression - Screams From The Gutter (Toxic Shock, 1985)

  • Turbonegro - Black Rabbit - Ass Cobra (Boomba Rec, 1996)

  • Black Flag - Depression - Damaged (SST Records, 1981)

  • Bad Brains - Big Take Over - Bad Brains (ROIR, 1982)

  • DOA - The Prisoner - The Prisoner 7” (Quintessence Records, 1978)

  • The Vandals - Wanna Be Manor - Peace Thru Vandalism (Epitaph, 1982)
